title: The Girl Who Stole the Eiffel Tower
description: Gaby and Rick fall for each other through ever changing scenery, plot, and adventure.
quote: What fun! Both of us having giraffes as children.
altHero: Gaby sitting at a cafe wearing a straw sun hat
alt3: Rick talks with two men drinking coffee
alt4: Gaby reclines on a bed, cigarette in mouth, pointing a gun at Rick
